data.name: Super Mega Hentai Collection!
data.detailed_description:
32 the hottest anime girls are waiting for you in «Super Mega Hentai Collection»!
This is a game with 167 high quality hentai arts, where you need to click on them, collect bonuses and earn points to undress attractive anime girls!



Different locations, seductive costumes, juicy bodies, unusual poses, adult toys!
The game «Super Mega Hentai Collection» has girls for every taste!

The game has 32 levels with 5 or 6 sublevels. A total of 167 qualitative hentai arts are waiting for you!



Sexy ladies you will meet:
— nurse;
— maids;
— girl in a pub;
— sportswoman;
— tennis player;
— girl on a beach with an adult toy;
— girls on a bed;
— chemistry student girl;
— girl with cows;
— student girl in a subway train;
— girls in a pool;
— squaw;
— tied girl;
— geisha;
— girl with adult magazine;
— girl on a battlefield;
— nun;
— catwoman;
— girls in an office;
— student girl at the table;
— girls on a beach;
— girl in an elevator;
— teacher at school;
— gamer girl;
— girl in a men's locker room.

Look at them, click on them, play with them, undress them!

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexually explicit scenes, Sexual adult content only, Adult content.
